code: import React from'react';import'./works.css';import{projectList}from'../../helpers/ProjectList';import ProjectItem from'../Projects/ProjectItem';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Works=function Works(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"works",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"worksTitle",children:"My portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"worksDesc",children:"Below are the collection of my personal projects:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projectList",children:projectList.map(function(project,idx){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",id:"btn",onClick:function onClick(){document.getElementById(project.link).scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectItem,{className:"btnn",id:idx,name:project.name})});})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"workBtn",children:" Click on each project to learn more"})]});};export default Works;
